content.raw:
Added the sensor visuals and multibeam to example. As the tutorials currently direct the user to create their own URDF to model their robot sensor’s \(the one in this PR is just an example\) I think we should hold off on the enable/disable flags until we have a preconfigured sensor suite for VMRC.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/4061184173-sensor_geometry.png)
‌
content.html:
Added the sensor visuals and multibeam to example. As the tutorials currently direct the user to create their own URDF to model their robot sensor’s (the one in this PR is just an example) I think we should hold off on the enable/disable flags until we have a preconfigured sensor suite for VMRC.
